dhp146-156:146: Ko nu hāso kimānando,niccaṁ pajjalite sati;Andhakārena onaddhā,padīpaṁ na gavesatha.
dhp146-156:147: Passa cittakataṁ bimbaṁ,arukāyaṁ samussitaṁ;Āturaṁ bahusaṅkappaṁ,yassa natthi dhuvaṁ ṭhiti.
dhp146-156:149: Yānimāni apatthāni,alābūneva sārade;Kāpotakāni aṭṭhīni,tāni disvāna kā rati.
dhp146-156:150: Aṭṭhīnaṁ nagaraṁ kataṁ,maṁsalohitalepanaṁ;Yattha jarā ca maccu ca,māno makkho ca ohito.
dhp146-156:151: Jīranti ve rājarathā sucittā,Atho sarīrampi jaraṁ upeti;Satañca dhammo na jaraṁ upeti,Santo have sabbhi pavedayanti.
dhp146-156:152: Appassutāyaṁ puriso,balībaddhova jīrati;Maṁsāni tassa vaḍḍhanti,paññā tassa na vaḍḍhati.
dhp146-156:154: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi,puna gehaṁ na kāhasi;Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā,gahakūṭaṁ visaṅkhataṁ;Visaṅkhāragataṁ cittaṁ,taṇhānaṁ khayamajjhagā.
dhp146-156:155: Acaritvā brahmacariyaṁ,aladdhā yobbane dhanaṁ;Jiṇṇakoñcāva jhāyanti,khīṇamaccheva pallale.
dhp146-156:156: Acaritvā brahmacariyaṁ,aladdhā yobbane dhanaṁ;Senti cāpātikhīṇāva,purāṇāni anutthunaṁ.
